content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You are having a video call with your friend Wang Meiying, who will soon be coming to your country to visit. Prompt 1
